message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for what it offers.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents the value I place on this product, I'm willing to come down to $130 for you. I believe that's a fair offer considering its quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
